name: Clefo's Notes
description:
Entry for The Honest Jam III! Theme: Dream.

How to Play: Drag Clefo with your mouse to move him, so he can collect clefs, ghosts and notes.

It also works with keyboard or controller, but it works better with a mouse.

The screenshots is what little story was going to be in-game.

Story: Clefo Nottington goes to bed with his plushies. He falls asleep and "awakes" in a dream where he has to collect all his plushies counterparts. By collecting most of it, (you just need to collect all the notes for the game to end) he wakes up and goes on with his merry life.

Credits:

Godot Game Template: Crystal Bit community

Programming: Gilokk0

Art: Gilokk0

Music: Fearless First by Kevin MacLeod
